source.title: Getting Started: Image Optimization | Next.js
source.description: Next.js Image component for automatic size optimisation, WebP format, lazy loading, blur placeholders, local images from public folder with automatic dimensions, remote images requiring width/height props, and remotePatterns security configuration.

source.title: Getting Started: Project Structure | Next.js
source.description: Folder and file conventions including top-level folders, routing files (layout, page, loading, error, route), dynamic routes, route groups, private folders, parallel and intercepted routes, metadata conventions, colocation patterns, component hierarchy.

source.title: Getting Started: Installation | Next.js
source.description: Installation methods using create-next-app CLI or manual setup, system requirements, configuration prompts for TypeScript, linting, Tailwind, App Router, creating app directory with layout and page files, development server, and absolute imports.

source.title: Configuration: TypeScript | Next.js
source.description: Next.js TypeScript configuration including IDE plugin, statically typed links, environment variable IntelliSense, custom tsconfig paths, build error handling, end-to-end type safety, and route-aware type helpers.

source.title: Getting Started: Layouts and Pages | Next.js
source.description: File-system routing with page and layout files, nested routes, dynamic segments using square brackets, nested layouts wrapping children, search parameters handling, Link component for navigation, and PageProps LayoutProps type helpers.

source.title: Testing: Vitest | Next.js
source.description: Setting up Vitest with Next.js: quickstart example, manual installation, configuration with jsdom and React Testing Library, creating unit tests for components, running tests, and limitations with async Server Components.

source.title: Testing: Playwright | Next.js
source.description: Setting up Playwright with Next.js for E2E testing: quickstart example, manual installation, creating navigation tests, running tests against production build, using webServer feature, and CI configuration with headless mode.

source.title: Guides: Testing | Next.js
source.description: Testing overview covering unit testing, component testing, integration testing, end-to-end testing, snapshot testing, async Server Components recommendations, and setup guides for Cypress, Jest, Playwright, and Vitest.

source.title: Testing: Jest | Next.js
source.description: Setting up Jest with Next.js for unit and snapshot testing including installation, configuration with next/jest transformer, handling module path aliases, custom matchers setup, creating test scripts, and example component tests.
